title: Drive: Sharing a File
body:
Drive: Sharing a File¶

Share File

  1. Click Share File

  2. Click Share via email * Enter the email address of the file recipient * If desired, edit the default email subject * If desired, edit the default email messages * Click Save

  3. Click Share via chat * Select the user(s) with which you would like to share the file * Click Share

  4. Click Share via link * Click Copy Link * Click Done
toc: • Drive: Sharing a File
